# Karen Kilroy - AI Technologist

> Developer and author focused on trustworthy AI deployment. O'Reilly Author, IBM Champion, C2PA AI/ML Task Force Co-Chair.

## About

Karen Kilroy is a developer, author, and educator building trustworthy AI systems. She led the IBM Watson Build-winning RILEY team at Kilroy Blockchain and now develops NYX NoCode, an educator-led platform that transforms classrooms into creative studios for generative AI.

## Key Work

- **NYX NoCode**: AI-driven platform for educators and students to build modern React apps with Azure OpenAI
- **Kilroy Blockchain**: Responsible AI systems and governance
- **C2PA AI/ML Task Force**: Co-chair helping implement content provenance standards
- **O'Reilly Books**: Blockchain Tethered AI, Natural Language and Search, AI and the Law, Blockchain as a Service
